name: Little Spaceship
description:
The game is in a retro style with a ship that flies through the galaxy 

shooting rocks on his way, you may destroy every rock

to get points and be the best

How it was made?

The game was made with the program Godot.

It was a challenge to create a game in 1 week fully complete

Want more?

You can support more projects like this by following me 

at my itch.io page or by giving a comment about the game
